documentation.text: @notice returns the address of the base fee receiver
@notice returns the absolute fee in BNB for launchpad creation
@notice returns the maximum duration of a launchpad in seconds
@notice returns the minimum duration of the lp locking period in seconds
@notice returns the relative referral fee charged on base and sale token fee in parts per 1000
@notice returns the duration of round 1 in seconds
@notice returns the sale token fee receiver address
@notice returns the relative sale token fee in parts per 1000

@notice returns if a given referrer is valid
 @param _referrer address of the checked referrer

attributes.text: @notice returns the address of the base fee receiver
@notice returns the absolute fee in BNB for launchpad creation
@notice returns the maximum duration of a launchpad in seconds
@notice returns the minimum duration of the lp locking period in seconds
@notice returns the relative referral fee charged on base and sale token fee in parts per 1000
@notice returns the duration of round 1 in seconds
@notice returns the sale token fee receiver address
@notice returns the relative sale token fee in parts per 1000

@notice returns if a given referrer is valid
 @param _referrer address of the checked referrer

params._user: address of the user to be checked

getBaseFeeReceiver().notice: returns the address of the base fee receiver

getGlmrCreationFee().notice: returns the absolute fee in BNB for launchpad creation

getMaxLaunchpadLength().notice: returns the maximum duration of a launchpad in seconds

getMinLockingDuration().notice: returns the minimum duration of the lp locking period in seconds

getReferralFee().notice: returns the relative referral fee charged on base and sale token fee in parts per 1000

getRound1Length().notice: returns the duration of round 1 in seconds

getSaleFeeReceiver().notice: returns the sale token fee receiver address

getTokenFee().notice: returns the relative sale token fee in parts per 1000

referrerIsValid(address).notice: returns if a given referrer is valid

userHoldsSufficientRound1Token(address).notice: returns if a given user has sufficient balance of early access tokens registered in the EARLY_ACCESS_TOKENS set to participate in round 1
